archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.1: Where an organisation allows the use of employee-owned devices (e.g. smartphones, tablets and laptops) for business purposes, this should be supported by documented standards/procedures, which cover:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
